articles.title: Congratulations, Your Privacy Is Worth $20 - Jacobin magazine
articles.description: Siri eavesdropped on users’ medical appointments and other private moments. With the pitiful settlement that was reached, Apple will now dole out enough hush money for each claimant to buy a few coffees.
